Topic.Title: The New Person in textadventures.co.uk, mike dorsett

Posts.EditableText: There is a Game called [url=http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=163:2uvp4rut]mikes boring life[/url:2uvp4rut] by mike dorsentt, well its supposed to be a game from Mocha Man called [url=http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=94:2uvp4rut]Spectrum[/url:2uvp4rut] Has far has I know it hasnt changed a bit So I found a little comment by David Revelle [quote="David Revelle in textadventures.co.uk":2uvp4rut]Review by David Revelle 23 Dec 2007 This isn't your game, this is a direct clone of Mocha Man's "Spectrum." His name is still in the game notes, even. Rating: 1 star [/quote:2uvp4rut] When you type credits or about it says: [quote="about":2uvp4rut]Game name: Spectrum Version: 1.1 Author: Mocha Man Copyright: Â© 2002 Mocha Man Entertainment Created with QDK 3.12.[/quote:2uvp4rut] [quote="credits":2uvp4rut]- Programming: Mocha Man - Software: QDK http://www.axeuk.com/quest NOTE: There are not any cheats for this game. No. None. Of course not. I'm not nervous. Do I look nervous? No cheats. Nada. heh heh...[/quote:2uvp4rut] We have to e-mail Alex to remove the game clone If we don't fix this he might start to copy another game and claim it's his!
Posts.HTML:
There is a Game called mikes boring life by mike dorsentt, well its supposed to be a game from Mocha Man called Spectrum

Has far has I know it hasnt changed a bit

So I found a little comment by David Revelle

David Revelle in textadventures.co.uk wrote:Review by David Revelle
23 Dec 2007

This isn't your game, this is a direct clone of Mocha Man's "Spectrum." His name is still in the game notes, even.

Rating: 1 star



When you type credits or about it says:

about wrote:Game name: Spectrum
Version: 1.1
Author: Mocha Man
Copyright: Â© 2002 Mocha Man Entertainment

Created with QDK 3.12.

credits wrote:- Programming: Mocha Man
- Software: QDK
http://www.axeuk.com/quest

NOTE: There are not any cheats for this game. No. None. Of course not. I'm not nervous. Do I look nervous? No cheats. Nada. heh heh...


We have to e-mail Alex to remove the game clone
If we don't fix this he might start to copy another game and claim it's his!

Posts.EditableText: I've now deleted this game, thanks to David for pointing this out.
Posts.HTML: I've now deleted this game, thanks to David for pointing this out.

Posts.EditableText: No problem, Alex.  Let's just hope that this guy just accidentally uploaded the wrong file (since "Spectrum" comes with the latest Quest release) and didn't purposely try to claim the game as his own.
